titles.title: Serve Our Heroes Now Act
To prohibit the awarding of contracts to contractors responsible for delayed openings of Veterans Affairs facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 4/3/2014--Introduced. Serve Our Heroes Now Act - Prohibits awarding a contract to any contractor whose past performance resulted in the completion of a construction project at a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) facility more than 24 months after the original agreed-upon completion date.
